Check: Registration with a password missing a digit
Expected Result: Registration is blocked, a validation message appears: "Password must contain at least one number"
Actual Result: Validation rule "At least one digit" remains highlighted in red

Steps to Reproduce: 2. Enter password: PasswordTest (valid length, uppercase, lowercase, but no numbers)

Expected Result: Registration is blocked, error message "Invalid email format" is shown
Actual Result: Error message "This is not like email." is shown

Check: Registration with password shorter than 9 characters
Expected Result: Registration is blocked, password rule "9 or more characters" remains highlighted
Actual Result: Validation rule "9 or more numbers" remains highlighted in red

Expected Result: User account is created, redirected to OLX profile/dashboard
Actual Result: Captcha shown. After confirmation, successful registration and message "Check your email"
Captcha displayed. Registration button unavailable. Captcha required.
